name: WP AMember Login
author: Pandhu Hutomo Aditya

sections.description: WP AMember Login overrides WordPress login with AMember login mechanism using AMember API. It allows you to login with AMember account on WordPress-based website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘amember-login’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the WP AMember Login menu to add Configure API Details
  4. Enter your API Host and API Key. You can obtain it from your AMember Admin Dashboard.
  5. Setup mapping rule
  6. Now You can login with your AMember credentials.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload ‘amember-login’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the WP AMember Login menu to add Configure API Details
  4. Enter your API Host and API Key. You can obtain it from your AMember Admin Dashboard.
  5. Setup mapping rule
  6. Now You can login with your AMember credentials.

I can’t login, why?

You should add your user manualy. Remember their username must be perfectly matched in both of AMember or WordPress.

Where should I report issues or bugs?

The ideal place for bug and issue reporting is on the GitHub site for the WP AMember Login project.

Where should I contribute code back to the project?

Thanks for asking! Please do share back code modifications or enhancements you make for inclusion in WP AMember Login core or as add-ons. (Visit us on GitHub to share your code with the WP AMember Login community.
sections.changelog:
1.3.1

  • Auto create User. No more import user.
  • New Mapping Feature. Map Subscribed Product to WordPress Role

1.0.0

  • Initial
  • You can login with your AMember credentials
  • Config API URL & API KEY form admin page
